item.title: Amazfit 2 Dynamic Core: Integration with Python
item.description: Overview Under the Amazit branch name, there are a lot of devices. Among them, Xiaomi sells ‘smart’ shoes (or sneakers) that have a device inside which measures some variables and also counts the steps. The device could be purchased alone, and is known as Amazfit 2 Smart Chip or Dynamic Core. In this recipe, we will use a Python library to connect to that device, and acquire the provided information.
